thread.section_title: Shangri-La's China World Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Beijing) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: 2 Night Stay
thread.title_full: 2 Night Stay - Review of Shangri-La's China World Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Cats_N_Cats_2
title: 2 Night Stay
text: We stayed at this hotel as part of a Celebrity Cruise excursion. Rooms were very spacious and extremely comfortable. The breakfast buffet had lots of choices with a heavy accent on local foods but enough Western food choices to fill you up. Staff was friendly and helpful. The local music demonstration in the lobby on our return was great.
